title: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry 'gets into drunken fight with Amelia Lily'
text:
Chloe Ferry and her new castmate Amelia Lily got into an altercation while filming for Geordie Shore on Sunday night.

Former X Factor star Amelia, 25, only joined the MTV reality show one week ago, but it seems tempers are already fraught and she might not be fitting in as well as show bosses had expected.

Despite being perfectly preened as they made their way into Newcastle's Powerhouse club at the start of the evening, by the end of the night the cast had descended into their typically debauched selves.

Clash: Chloe Ferry and her new castmate Amelia Lily got into an altercation while filming for Geordie Shore on Sunday night

Upset: Chloe, 24, (back) was shouting at Amelia, 25, (front) refusing to let her into the minicab with the rest of the Geordie Shore gang

Chloe, 24, was heard shouting at Amelia, refusing to let her into the minis with the rest of the Geordie Shore gang.

A source told MailOnline: 'The cast all left the club without Amelia, who was brought out last by producers.

'She was asked to jump into the back of the minibus with Chloe, Bethan and Natalie, but Chloe kicked off and refused to open the door.'

Producers were forced to intervene to try and resolve the situation, but Chloe point blank refused to give in and wouldn't let Amelia join them in the car.

A source said: 'Amelia was asked to jump into the back of the minibus with Chloe, Bethan and Natalie but Chloe kicked off and refused to open the door'

Fallout: Former X Factor star Amelia only joined the MTV reality show one week ago, but it seems tempers are already fraught

Helping hand: Producers rushed to help the singer, but Chloe refused to open the door

Drama: Appearing distressed, Amelia held her head in her hands as she climbed into the front seat of the vehicle

In video footage of the incident, a producer is heard asking, 'Can you check the list and tell me what car Amelia's supposed to get in?'

Moments later, Amelia emerges and tries to get into the back, but Chloe slams the door in her face.

'Go home! Go in the other car! No! No!', Chloe is heard shouting.

The producer chimes in, 'Chloe I need her in the back', prompting Chloe to kick and lash out in the backseat as someone else says, 'She's not having any of it, mate!'.

Poor thing: Thus far, Amelia had appeared to get on well with her new co-stars and had been seen filming with them all week

Windswept: Chloe battled the wind as she clambered out of the car earlier on in the evening

Taking a tumble: Chloe almost fell out of the taxi as she kept the party going

Amelia eventually had to be bundled into the front of the vehicle, looking upset as she held her head in her hands.

Thus far, Amelia had appeared to get on well with her new co-stars and had been seen filming with them all week.

Amelia has been brought into the fold in a bid to shake up the long-running series following a string of departures.

A source told The Sun: 'Bosses are made up they've signed Amelia for the show and promise she will make it the best series yet, she's always up for a laugh and will make great telly for viewers.

Woops! The reality star climbed up on Beau Brennan's back, narrowly avoiding a fall

Gang: Abbie Holborn, Beau Brennan and Natalie Phillips strolled along beside a barefoot Chloe

Covering up: The bubbly blonde donned an oversized leather jacket in a bid to keep warm

Grin and bear it: Chloe seemed totally fine before things went on the turn

'Amelia's not shy about saying what she thinks either so things could get explosive.'

Chloe's ex Sam Gowland and show stalwart Sophie Kaseai have left the show ahead of the upcoming 21st series.

Earlier in the evening, the Geordie Shore squad had all looked perfectly poised and composed as they pulled up outside the venue.

Chloe left little to the imagination in her cut-out bodysuit, going braless in the daring number.

Looking good: At the start of the evening, the cast were looking far more poised, including Abbie (left) and Nathan Henry (right)

Back in the fold: Geordie Shore OG James Tindale has been loving every minute back on the reality programme

Before it all went wrong: Amelia was dressed to impress in a pink, tiger print wrap dress with a low-cut neckline

She slipped her hourglass figure into a pair of high-waisted PVC trousers that clung to her every curve.

Amelia was dressed to impress in a pink, tiger print wrap dress with a low-cut neckline.

The gang looked windswept as they tumbled out of the taxi and went on to another club, with Chloe almost stacking it on the floor.

She struggled to maintain her composure as she battled with her long, tangled hair extensions.

Daring: Chloe slipped her hourglass figure into a pair of high-waisted PVC trousers that clung to her every curve

Revealing: Chloe dared to bare in her itsy bitsy top, revealing a liberal amount of underboob

Putting her best foot forward: The outspoken TV personality added some extra height to her frame thanks to a pair of Perspex heels
